mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (`player_id`)) dau FROM `log_account` WHERE `create_date` = #{getTime} AND `type` = 2

SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT count(a.`player_id`) AS addPayPlayer FROM `game_order` a LEFT JOIN `log_account` b ON a.`player_id` = b.`player_id` AND b.`server_id` = a.`server_id` WHERE b.`server_id` = #{serverId} AND b.`type` = 1 AND a.`server_id` = #{serverId} AND b.`create_date` = DATE (#{date}) AND DATE (a.`pay_time`) = DATE (#{date}) GROUP BY a.`player_id`) c WHERE c.`addPayPlayer` >= 2;
